org.raistlic.common.assertion

Interface BooleanAssertion

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Assertion<java.lang.Boolean,BooleanAssertion>

    public interface BooleanAssertion
extends Assertion<java.lang.Boolean,BooleanAssertion>
    Defines useful expectations on a Boolean candidate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void isFalse()
      Checks that the wrapped Boolean candidate is equal to Boolean.FALSE , or otherwise throws an appropriate exception.
      void isFalse(java.lang.String message)
      Checks that the wrapped Boolean candidate is equal to Boolean.FALSE , or otherwise throws an appropriate exception with the specified message .
      void isTrue()
      Checks that the wrapped Boolean candidate is equal to Boolean.TRUE , or otherwise throws an appropriate exception.
      void isTrue(java.lang.String message)
      Checks that the wrapped Boolean candidate is equal to Boolean.TRUE , or otherwise throws an appropriate exception with the specified message .

      • Methods inherited from interface org.raistlic.common.assertion.Assertion

        isEqualTo, isEqualTo, isInstanceOf, isInstanceOf, isNotEqualTo, isNotEqualTo, isNotNull, isNotNull, isNull, isNull, matches, matches

        void isTrue()
        Checks that the wrapped Boolean candidate is equal to Boolean.TRUE , or otherwise throws an appropriate exception.
